title: Stocks to Watch: The Picture Is Improving
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin, deputy editor Ben Levisohn and Barry Bannister, managing director and chief equity strategist at Stifel, discuss what's behind the recent rally, the outlook for bank stocks and bonds, and what to buy in a range-bound market.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
